title: 2025 Miami GP results - Piastri wins from Norris as McLaren crushes rivals
summary: Piastri wins the Miami GP to take his third consecutive victory to consolidate his championship lead ahead of Norris

qa_pairs.question: Who won the 2025 Miami Grand Prix?
Which team achieved a strong performance at the 2025 Miami GP, finishing ahead of their rivals?
How many consecutive victories did Oscar Piastri achieve with his win at the Miami GP?
